projects.name: Coca-Cola HappyShopmate
projects.description: An iOS application that rewards Coca-Cola's loyal customers with different prizes and discounts just by completing missions and/or earn methods (selfies, social media sharing etc.)

projects.name: Haikuism
projects.description: An iOS application which allows its users to compose and share their Haikus in-app or in social media. Users can also exchange Haikus with one another and draw inspiration from their friends by using their haikus in creating a collection

projects.name: Zukii
projects.description: An iOS application which aims to help small-medium entrepreneurs  in starting their businesses as well as giving rewards to loyal customers who purchase and endorse existing shops and/or products through social networking sites. Moreover it is an e-commerce application that provides ensured delivery that puts the customer's concerns as top priority

projects.name: Samsung Cloud Print
projects.description: An iOS Application that allows its users to print images and documents on the go while retaining the features of Mobile Print solution. SCP allows its user to print anywhere in the world by the use of Cloud technology, just select a registered or shared printer on your device list and send the document you want to print

projects.name: Samsung Printer Diagnostic System
projects.description: SPDS is a diagnostic application for Samsung printers. It can also be used to control the printer remotely and test the hardware and its functionalities. Lastly, it can be used to generate a full report of the current state of the printer being tested.

projects.name: Mobile Print
projects.description: An iOS application that allows users to print and scan images, PDF and documents from their phones to their Samsung printers and vice-versa.
